channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SOLR-16510] StreamDecoratorTest.testParallelTerminatingDaemonUpdateStream ConcurrentModificationException
item.description:
https://lists.apache.org/list?builds@solr.apache.org:lte=1y:java.util.ConcurrentModificationException

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I think I see the issue. I'll put up a PR for it.

A PR is up:

https://github.com/apache/solr/pull/1162

The key to understanding this issue is this line in the stack trace:

org.apache.solr.handler.StreamHandler$DaemonCollectionStream.read(StreamHandler.java:432)

Once you get into that method it becomes clear how this error could occur.

Commit 1ce4d6b329cec3df9fbc4c65ed4e43d1795dc62f in solr's branch refs/heads/main from Joel Bernstein
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=solr.git;h=1ce4d6b329c ]

SOLR-16510: Fix StreamDecoratorTest.testParallelTerminatingDaemonUpdateStream Con… (#1162)

  • Fix StreamDecoratorTest.testParallelTerminatingDaemonUpdateStream ConcurrentModificationException
  • SOLR-16510: Remove unused import
